languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте доложить: Джай Хейдари... исчезла. Сложно сказать, когда и как именно она покинула судно, но вещей пропало немного — ее личное оружие, грамота и небольшая шкатулка с ценными бумагами. Полагаю, Джай вернулась на Футфол. Согласно отчетам вокс-офицеров, она все повторяла команде, что ее там ждет "последнее правое дело".

"Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте доложить: Джай Хейдари... исчезла. Сложно сказать, когда и как именно она покинула судно, но вещей пропало немного — ее личное оружие, грамота и небольшая шкатулка с ценными бумагами. Полагаю, Джай вернулась на Футфол. Согласно отчетам вокс-офицеров, она все повторяла команде, что ее там ждет "последнее правое дело".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box where she kept documents of value. It is reasonable to assume that she went to Footfall. According to the reports, she mentioned on a number of occasions that it is where she intended to 'do the last decent thing in her life.'"

"Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box where she kept documents of value. It is reasonable to assume that she went to Footfall. According to the reports, she mentioned on a number of occasions that it is where she intended to 'do the last decent thing in her life.'"

"Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

"Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

"Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

"Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je viens au rapport. Jae Heydari... s'est volatilisée. Difficile de dire quand et comment elle a quitté le vaisseau, mais certains objets ont disparu : ses armes, son certificat et une petite boîte contenant des obligations. Tout porte à croire qu'elle est retournée à Castel. Selon les rapports des officiers-vox, elle répétait souvent à l'équipage qu'elle était appelée à y accomplir sa dernière mission en ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je viens au rapport. Jae Heydari... s'est volatilisée. Difficile de dire quand et comment elle a quitté le vaisseau, mais certains objets ont disparu : ses armes, son certificat et une petite boîte dans laquelle elle conservait des documents importants. Elle s'est probablement rendue à Castel. D'après les rapports, elle a souvent évoqué l'idée de retourner à la station pour y faire "la dernière bonne action de sa vie". »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, erbitte Bericht erstatten zu dürfen. Jae Heydari ... ist weg. Es ist schwer zu sagen, wann und wie sie das Schiff verlassen hat, aber es fehlen nur wenige Dinge ... ihre persönlichen Waffen, ihr Zertifikat und eine kleine Schatulle mit Sicherheiten. Ich vermute, sie ist nach Footfall zurückgekehrt. Berichten des Vox-Offiziers zufolge hat sie der Crew immer wieder erzählt, dass sie dort 'die letzte anständige Tat ihres Lebens' vollbringen würde."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, erbitte Bericht erstatten zu dürfen. Jae Heydari ... ist weg. Es ist schwer zu sagen, wann und wie sie das Schiff verlassen hat, aber es fehlen nur wenige Dinge ... ihre persönlichen Waffen, ihr Zertifikat und eine kleine Schatulle mit Sicherheiten. Ich vermute, sie ist nach Footfall zurückgekehrt. Berichten des Vox-Offiziers zufolge hat sie der Crew immer wieder erzählt, dass sie dort 'die letzte anständige Tat ihres Lebens' vollbringen würde."

languages.text: “舰长大人，请允许我报告。婕伊·海达利……失踪了，没人知道她是什么时候，通过什么手段离开了这艘舰船。不过，她的几件私人物品也不见了，包括她的随身武器、她的证书、以及一个装着各种有价证券的小盒子。我相信她应该是回到了落脚港。音阵军官的报告显示，她失踪前常常说她打算去落脚港做‘这辈子最后一件体面事儿’。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请允许我报告。婕伊·海达利……失踪了，没人知道她是什么时候，通过什么手段离开了这艘舰船。不过，她的几件私人物品也不见了，包括她的随身武器、她的证书、以及一个装着各种重要文件的小盒子。我们有理由认为她去了落脚港。根据报告显示，她失踪前常常说她打算去落脚港做‘这辈子最后一件体面事儿’。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, permiso para informar. Jae Heydari... se ha esfumado. Es difícil determinar cuándo y cómo ha abandonado la nave, pero solo faltan unas pocas cosas: sus armas personales, su certificado y una pequeña caja de objetos personales. Creo que ha regresado a Paso. Según los informes de oficiales de voco, varios tripulantes la han oído decir que es ahí donde iba a hacer su "última acción decente"».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, permiso para informar. Jae Heydari... se ha esfumado. Es difícil determinar cuándo y cómo ha abandonado la nave, pero solo faltan unas pocas cosas: sus armas personales, su certificado y una pequeña caja donde guardaba documentos valiosos. Sería razonable suponer que ha ido a Paso. Según los informes, había mencionado repetidamente que en Paso iba a hacer su "última acción decente"».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告いたします。ジェイ・ヘイダリが…いなくなりました。いつ、どのようにして船を離れたのかは不明ですが、失われているのはごくわずかです。彼女の個人用の武器、証明書、そして有価証券の入った小箱だけです。おそらく彼女はフットフォールへ戻ったものと思われます。ヴォクス士官の報告によれば、彼女はそこで『人生で最後にまともなことをする』つもりだと、常にクルーに語っていたそうです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告いたします。ジェイ・ヘイダリが…いなくなりました。いつ、どのようにして船を離れたのかは不明ですが、失われているのはごくわずかです。彼女の個人用の武器、証明書、そして有価証券の入った小箱だけです。おそらく彼女はフットフォールへ戻ったものと思われます。ヴォクス士官の報告によれば、彼女はそこで『人生で最後にまともなことをする』つもりだと、常にクルーに語っていたそうです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, izninizle bildiriyorum: Jae Heydari... Gitmiş. Gemiden ne zaman veya nasıl ayrıldığını söylemek zor. Fakat yanında sadece silahlarını, tasdiknamesini ve tahvillerini sakladığı ufak bir kutuyu götürmüş. Sanıyorum ki Binliman'a döndü. Voks subaylarının raporlarına göre mürettebata orada 'ömrünün son iyiliğini' yapacağını söyleyip duruyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report. Jae Heydari... is gone. It is difficult to say when and how she left the ship, but only a few items are missing — her personal weapons, her certificate, and a small box containing securities. I believe she has returned to Footfall. According to vox-officer reports, she was always telling the crew that she would do the 'last decent thing in her life' there."
